TopicTitle: Forgot to say something here for a long time

Articles.Content:
As you may have noticed, I've been in these forum for a long time.

Despite this, I never said anything here: I forgot to do so at first, then just forgot to do so :/

As I will reach my 1000 post, I thought it could be a good idea to say "hi" here!

So, hi! (I don't really know I could say: after all, I can't say I'm new to the forums ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )

Hi...

And congrats to your 1K post!
I don't think I did either, but IDK, for me, it might be just awkward at this point. Congrats on the 1K!

i think i posted mine swell but I'm to lazy to go find it.

also hello! as i don't think I've seen you before.

I never posted one, either.

Well, I guess I should now here, then, huh?

*Hello, i'm Norpo, and I play Kerbal Space Program.*

*That is all.*
I also did not post a welcome message. I think i will post one on my 10 millionth post (which is NEVAR!).
Hah, well I'll just have to hop in the TARDIS and welcome you aboard way back in 2012, then!

Hi,

I haven't said anything in this forum yet either. (I haven't been on the forums as long, though)
Holy geebus GP. Welcome to the forums?
